## _Learning objectives_ {.center}

_Enable model validators to review and approve documentation on the ValidMind platform. Collaborate with model developers._

## Prerequisites {.center}

To try out this training module, you need to have been [onboarded](training-overview.html#onboarding) onto the ValidMind training environment.

Log into the ValidMind Platform UI to check your access:
